Much like soldiers, spider guards are sworn to protect their kingdom. The guard\'s venom is used to immobilize their target, causing paralysis and making them an easy prey.

Amber spiders are mysterious and rare creatures that poses psychic powers similar to regular psi-spiders, but are much tougher physically. The name "amber" refers to the color of their giant brain-sacks, that are revealed before their victims as Amber Spiders strike using their powers.
